definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: quiver, wave, waver, tremble, totter (NH Pilp. [[נִעְנַע]] shake, Aram. [[נוּעַ]] waver, stagger (rare); Ar. nw9, na09a bend (of boughs), v. commotus fuit (of id.), so Kam Frey; also change, naw9un kind, species, variety; Di cp. Eth. na9awa: hunt);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[נׇ֫עוּ]] Job 28:4 +; [[וְנׇע֫וּ]] Am 4:8 + 2 t.; Impf. [[וַיׇּ֫נַע]] Is 7:2; 3 fs. [[תָּנוּעַ]] Is 24:20; [[אֲנוּעְֲ]] 2Sa 15:20 Kt (but rd Qr Hiph q. v.); [[יׇנ֫וּעוּ]] Ps 109:10; [[יְנוּעָוּן]] Ps 59:16 Kt (so rd.; not Qr Hiph.), etc.; Inf. abs. Is 24:20, Ps 109:10;  cstr. [[נוּעַ]] Ju Jdg 9:9 +3 t.; [[נוֹעַ]] Is 7:2; Pt. [[נׇע]] Ge 4:12, Ge 4:14; [[נׇעִים]] Pr 22:19; [[נׇעוֹת]] 1Sa 1:13:—

wave, of trees, sq. [[עַל]] Ju Jdg 9:9, Jdg 9:11, Jdg 9:13 sq. [[מִפְּנֵי]] of cause Is 7:2; quiver, vibrate, of lips 1Sa 1:13; swing  (to and fro) of miners Job 28:4 (‖[[דלל]]); stagger like drunkard, of mariners in storm Ps 107:27 (‖[[חגג]]), cf. Is 29:9 (‖[[שׁכר]]); hence be unstable, fig. of ways of harlot Pr 5:6; tremble, of doorposts, Is 6:4 (sq. [[מִן]] caus.), idols Is 19:1 (sq. [[מִפְּנֵי]]), earth Is 24:20 (‖[[התנודד]]), people Ex 20:18 (E); fig. of heart Is 7:2.

totter, go tottering (faint and uncertain) La 4:14 v:La 4:15 (‖[[נוּץ]]), Am 8:12 (‖[[שׁוטט]]); as beggars Ps 109:10 (‖[[שִׁאֵל]]), cf. Ps 59:16; Am 4:8 sq. [[אֶל־]]; pt. vagabond Ge 4:12, Ge 4:14 (both ‖[[נׇד]]); fig. = err, sin, Je 14:10.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִנּוֹעַ]] Am 9:9 be tossed about (of corn) in a sieve; [[יִנּוֹעוּ]] id., of bulwarks as fig-trees Na 3:12 (‖[[נפל]]).
toss about Am 9:9 subj. ´[[י]], obj. Isr. sq. [[בַּגּוֹיִם]] (cf.

shake, cause to totter: = set me tottering Da 10:10 on my knees and hands; esp. shake or wag the head, in mockery 2Ki 19:21 = Is 37:22 (‖[[בוז]], [[לעג]]) cf. Ps 22:8, Ps 109:25; sq. [[עַל־]] Job 16:4 (´[[בְּמוֹ ר]] [Ges:§ 119 q]), also La 2:15 (‖[[שׁרק]]), Zep 2:15 [[יׇדוֹ]] (‖ id.), [v. also Sir 12:18, Sir 13:7 (´[[בְּר]])].
cause to wander Nu 32:13 (J); 2Sa 15:20 (sq. [[ללכת]]); Ps 59:12 (‖[[הוריד]], for which Lag:Proph. Chald. xlviii. prop. [[הניד]]).
